text: The Ontario Hockey League (OHL), is a professional ice hockey league based in Canada and features 17 teams from Canada and 3 teams from the United States. For a player to play in the Ontario Hockey League they have to be between the ages of 15 to 20. The main championship for the OHL is the J. Ross Robertson Cup which is awarded to the winner of the Ontario Hockey League playoff championship. The current holders of the Cup is the London Knights. The Ontario Hockey League is one of the three Major Junior ice hockey leagues which is part of the Canadian Hockey League (CHL). == Teams in the OHL == Current Teams Division Team Arena Location Eastern Conference East Brantford Bulldogs Brantford Civic Centre Brantford, Ontario East Kingston Frontenacs Slush Puppie Place Kingston, Ontario East Oshawa Generals Tribute Communities Centre Oshawa, Ontario East Ottawa 67's TD Place Arena Ottawa, Ontario East Peterborough Petes Peterborough Memorial Centre Peterborough, Ontario Central Barrie Colts Sadlon Arena Barrie, Ontario Central Brampton Steelheads CAA Centre Brampton, Ontario Central Niagara IceDogs Meridian Centre St. Catharines, Ontario Central North Bay Battalion North Bay Memorial Gardens North Bay, Ontario Central Sudbury Wolves Sudbury Community Arena Sudbury, Ontario Western Conference Midwest Erie Otters Erie Insurance Arena Erie, Pennsylvania, USA Midwest Guelph Storm Sleeman Centre Guelph, Ontario Midwest Kitchener Rangers Kitchener Memorial Auditorium Complex Kitchener, Ontario Midwest London Knights Canada Life Place London, Ontario Midwest Owen Sound Attack Harry Lumley Bayshore Community Centre Owen Sound, Ontario West Flint Firebirds Dort Federal Credit Union Event Center Flint, Michigan, USA West Saginaw Spirit Dow Event Center Saginaw, Michigan, USA West Sarnia Sting Progressive Auto Sales Arenae Sarnia, Ontario West Sault Ste.
